testcase.name: User logins to Dashboard with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user logs in as "sales manager"....................................passed

testcase.name: User logins to Dashboard with valid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user logs in as "store manager"....................................passed

testcase.name: User logins to Dashboard with valid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user logs in as "driver"...........................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user enter invalid username and valid password.....................passed Then The user see Invalid user name or password error message...............passed

testcase.name: Login with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user enter valid username and invalid password.....................passed Then The user see Invalid user name or password error message...............passed

testcase.name: Login with empty username and random password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user enter empty username and random password......................passed Then The user see Lütfen bu alanı doldurun error message....................passed

testcase.name: Login with random username and empty password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user enter random username and empty password......................passed Then The user see Lütfen bu alanı doldurun error message....................passed

testcase.name: Login with empty username and empty password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user enter empty username and empty password.......................passed Then The user see Lütfen bu alanı doldurun error message....................passed

testcase.name: Click Forgot your password? link
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user click Forgot your password? link..............................passed Then The user see Forgot Password page......................................passed

testcase.name: "Remember me on this computer" link exists
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed Then The user see Forgot Remember me on this computer link..................passed

testcase.name: Clickable "Remember me on this computer" link
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When The user see Remember me on this computer link is clickable............passed

testcase.name: User should see the password in bullet signs by default (like ****)
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User type the password.................................................passed Then User see the password in bullet signs by default.......................passed

testcase.name: Verify if the ‘Enter’ key of the keyboard is working correctly on the login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User press enter key of the keyboard...................................passed Then User see enter key is working..........................................passed

testcase.name: All users can see their own usernames in the profile menu, after successful login
testcase.failure:
Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When User enter valid username and valid password and click.................passed Then User see own username in the profile menu..............................failed
